statements: UPDATE sensor_data SET camera_data = '{"resolution": "1080p", "fps": 30}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sensor_data SET lidar_data = '{"range": 100, "accuracy": 0.95}' WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
UPDATE sensor_data SET camera_data = '{"resolution": "HD", "fps": 30}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sensor_data SET lidar_data = '{"range": 100, "resolution": "high"}', timestamp = '2022-07-15 08:30:00' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Cameras SET location = 'Entrance', resolution = '1920x1080' WHERE camera_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE LidarSensors SET range = 60.5, location = 'Parking Lot' WHERE sensor_id = '87654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Cameras SET resolution = '4K', fov = 120.5 WHERE camera_id = '1a6a8d60-00b1-4cf4-8e19-b7f09b19a9b8';
UPDATE LidarSensors SET range = 200.75, accuracy = 0.95 WHERE sensor_id = '3d1596f3-7c8d-4184-9a0b-29eab32bc047';
UPDATE cameras SET image_url = 'http://example.com/image1.png' WHERE camera_id = 101;
UPDATE object_detection SET detected_object = 'car' WHERE detection_id = 201;
UPDATE cameras SET image_url = 'https://example.com/image1.jpg', timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE lidar_sensors SET distance = 10.5, sensor_id = 1001 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Cameras SET location='Room A', framerate=30 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE LidarSensors SET accuracy=0.95, location='Outdoor' WHERE sensor_id=2;
UPDATE Cameras SET resolution='1080p', framerate=30 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE LidarSensors SET accuracy=0.95, location='Building A' WHERE sensor_id=5;
UPDATE Cameras SET resolution='1080p', location='Entrance', streaming_url='rtsp://example.com/cam1' WHERE camera_id=1;
UPDATE LidarSensors SET range=150.75, frequency=10, location='Front Gate' WHERE sensor_id=2;
UPDATE Cameras SET resolution = '4K', streaming_url = 'rtsp://newurl/stream1' WHERE camera_id = 1;
UPDATE LidarSensors SET frequency = 100, range = 150.75 WHERE sensor_id = 3;
